wikipedia_page.main: Edith Sheriff MacGregor Rome RRC SRN (died 6 June 1938) was a British nursing matron and administrator. She served as President of the Royal College of Nursing (RCN) from 1933–34 and again from 1937–38.

link_mentions.page: History of nursing in the United Kingdom

response: * Edith MacGregor Rome (died 1938), British nursing matron and administrator
